The strides are too large, I just can't...!\""},{"lineNumber":142043,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラの歩幅は数十メートル、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Babora's stride was several dozen meters,"},{"lineNumber":142044,"originalJapaneseLine":"数歩であっという間に遠くへ移動していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and in just a few steps, he moved far away in an instant."},{"lineNumber":142045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーっ！　なんちゅう逃げ足だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah! What speed for fleeing!\""},{"lineNumber":142046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ、貴様ら、ここで何をしている！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you guys, what are you doing here!?\""},{"lineNumber":142047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いかん、見つかった！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No good, we've been spotted!\""},{"lineNumber":142048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵襲ーッ！　敵襲ーッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Enemy attack! Enemy attack!\""},{"lineNumber":142049,"originalJapaneseLine":"　侵入者だ！　ここに集まれーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Intruders! Assemble here!\""},{"lineNumber":142050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、侵入者だと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha- Intruders!?\""},{"lineNumber":142051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ、撤退ーッ！　戦略的撤退ーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, retreat! Strategic retreat!\""},{"lineNumber":142052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、逃がすなァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't let them get away!\""},{"lineNumber":142053,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラ親衛隊の隊長である魔物将軍は","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general, leader of Babora's guards,"},{"lineNumber":142054,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の司令官室で怒りに震えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was trembling with rage in the demon army's command room."},{"lineNumber":142055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぶた野郎！　糞が！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That damn pig! Damn it!\""},{"lineNumber":142056,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ええい！　なんだこれは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Argh! What is this!\""},{"lineNumber":142057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、魔物将軍、どうされましたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Demon General, what happened?\""},{"lineNumber":142058,"originalJapaneseLine":"たまたま報告に来ていた魔物隊長が","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon captain who had come to report happened to see,"},{"lineNumber":142059,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋で暴れ回る魔物将軍に目を丸くする。","translatedEnglishLine":"and was wide-eyed at the demon general rampaging in the room."},{"lineNumber":142060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーっ、ふーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff, huff.\""},{"lineNumber":142061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ルメイ、あの男のことだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lumei, about that man...\""},{"lineNumber":142062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":142063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ルメイ魔物大将軍のことですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're talking about Lumei, the great demon general...\""},{"lineNumber":142064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、あんな奴に大将軍なんぞつけんでいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, he doesn't deserve the title of great general."},{"lineNumber":142065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつから手紙が届いたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A letter arrived from him."},{"lineNumber":142066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前も読んでみろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You should read it too.\""},{"lineNumber":142067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　はあ……では、失礼して……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Huh... Well then, excuse me...\""},{"lineNumber":142068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああ、これはひどいですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, this is terrible indeed.\""},{"lineNumber":142069,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまでは怒りに燃える魔物将軍に","translatedEnglishLine":"Until then, the demon captain had been amazed at the furious demon general,"},{"lineNumber":142070,"originalJapaneseLine":"驚いていた魔物隊長も、","translatedEnglishLine":"but after glancing at the letter,"},{"lineNumber":142071,"originalJapaneseLine":"手紙に目を通し眉をひそめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"he frowned."},{"lineNumber":142072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこから西にある砦を落とすように、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It says to capture the fortress to the west from there,"},{"lineNumber":142073,"originalJapaneseLine":"　脳みそが空っぽのバボラ様は","translatedEnglishLine":"because Babora-sama has an empty brain,"},{"lineNumber":142074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その程度しか出来ないでしょうから、だそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"he can only manage something like that, apparently.\""},{"lineNumber":142075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「完全にバボラ様を馬鹿にしている！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're completely mocking Babora-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":142076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かにヘルマンを攻める大半の魔物を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, the majority of demons attacking Helman are being commanded by that Lumei.\""},{"lineNumber":142077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　指揮しているのは、あのルメイだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He is the one leading them.\""},{"lineNumber":142078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、数は少なくとも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But even if the numbers are few,"},{"lineNumber":142079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人と、その部隊の方がよっぽど格上なのだぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon lord and his unit are far superior!\""},{"lineNumber":142080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴め、バボラ様が反撃なさらないと踏んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That guy thinks Babora-sama won't counterattack,"},{"lineNumber":142081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんどん増長しやがって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so he's becoming increasingly arrogant...\""},{"lineNumber":142082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンク様には","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apparently, he's humble towards Kesselink-sama,"},{"lineNumber":142083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　へりくだっているそうですし、","translatedEnglishLine":"and that's certainly frustrating...\""},{"lineNumber":142084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確かに腹が立ちますね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It really makes one angry...\""},{"lineNumber":142085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いっそ、こんなもの無視してしまいますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Should we just ignore something like this?\""},{"lineNumber":142086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうしてしまいたいがな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I’d like to do that,"},{"lineNumber":142087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンク様からの進言でもあると","translatedEnglishLine":"but it's also a recommendation from Kesselink-sama,"},{"lineNumber":142088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　念を押してきている」","translatedEnglishLine":"and he's been very insistent about it.\""},{"lineNumber":142089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンク様のお言葉なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it's Kesselink-sama's words..."},{"lineNumber":142090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バボラ様の立場の為にも","translatedEnglishLine":"it's also for Babora-sama's own position."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追え！　逃がすな！」
「む、無茶よ！　一歩が大きすぎてとても……ッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-It's reckless! The strides are too large, I just can't...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラの歩幅は数十メートル、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Babora's stride was several dozen meters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数歩であっという間に遠くへ移動していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in just a few steps, he moved far away in an instant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーっ！　なんちゅう逃げ足だ！」
「うわっ、貴様ら、ここで何をしている！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you guys, what are you doing here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかん、見つかった！」
「敵襲ーッ！　敵襲ーッ！
侵入者だ！　ここに集まれーッ！」
「む、侵入者だと！？」
「くそ、撤退ーッ！　戦略的撤退ーッ！」
「あ、逃がすなァ！」
バボラ親衛隊の隊長である魔物将軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general, leader of Babora's guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の司令官室で怒りに震えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was trembling with rage in the demon army's command room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのぶた野郎！　糞が！
ええい！　なんだこれは！」
「ま、魔物将軍、どうされましたか？」
たまたま報告に来ていた魔物隊長が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon captain who had come to report happened to see,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋で暴れ回る魔物将軍に目を丸くする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was wide-eyed at the demon general rampaging in the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、ふーっ」
「ルメイ、あの男のことだ……」
「あ、ああ……
ルメイ魔物大将軍のことですか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're talking about Lumei, the great demon general..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、あんな奴に大将軍なんぞつけんでいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, he doesn't deserve the title of great general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつから手紙が届いたのだ。
お前も読んでみろ」
「？　はあ……では、失礼して……」
「……ああ、これはひどいですね」
それまでは怒りに燃える魔物将軍に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, the demon captain had been amazed at the furious demon general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚いていた魔物隊長も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but after glancing at the letter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙に目を通し眉をひそめた。
「そこから西にある砦を落とすように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It says to capture the fortress to the west from there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脳みそが空っぽのバボラ様は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because Babora-sama has an empty brain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その程度しか出来ないでしょうから、だそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he can only manage something like that, apparently."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全にバボラ様を馬鹿にしている！」
「確かにヘルマンを攻める大半の魔物を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, the majority of demons attacking Helman are being commanded by that Lumei."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮しているのは、あのルメイだ」
「だが、数は少なくとも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But even if the numbers are few,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人と、その部隊の方がよっぽど格上なのだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon lord and his unit are far superior!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴め、バボラ様が反撃なさらないと踏んで、
どんどん増長しやがって……」
「ケッセルリンク様には
へりくだっているそうですし、
確かに腹が立ちますね……」
「いっそ、こんなもの無視してしまいますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Should we just ignore something like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうしてしまいたいがな、
ケッセルリンク様からの進言でもあると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's also a recommendation from Kesselink-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 念を押してきている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he's been very insistent about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッセルリンク様のお言葉なら……
バボラ様の立場の為にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's also for Babora-sama's own position.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he can only manage something like that, apparently."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon lord and his unit are far superior!"

へりくだっているそうですし、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Should we just ignore something like this?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he's been very insistent about it."
